ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: I m sorry, did I see you mention that we can t used ranged weapons? Hmmm, in that case I may have to go back to my guild and ask for a refund. I have dumped a
ygData.messageBody:
I'm sorry, did I see you mention that we can't used ranged weapons? Hmmm, in
that case I may have to go back to my guild and ask for a refund. I have
dumped a number of training points into Thrown Weapons skills, along with a
fairly good outlay of cash going towards throwing daggers, which, one of the
ladies in the Guild Hall in Kelethin sells....

Lulen

----- Original Message -----
From: Dan Bouchard <dbouch@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 20:08
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)


> From: "Dan Bouchard" <dbouch@...>
>
> Quick note in case some of you don't know:
>
> The Dragoon Dirk can be equipped in your ranged weapon slot. This is
> good if you don't use Piercing but still want to reap the magical benefits
> of the Dirk. We can't use ranged weapons, so we might as well make some
use
> of that slot.
>
> --Danner Bramblethorn
> Tarrew Marr
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Got an opinion?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.
>
